name: Katherine Patrick
fullText:
Bro...
Clean-tech is dead?
Not when SOLIS + COR launch from WKSP

Solar gear you don’t mount on a roof or wait 2 years to install.
You buy it. You use it. You flex it.
Off-grid power, truck-bed solar - actual use-case, real demand

Market cap $17M, and they’re guiding for https://t.co/cBlacdSQr3
